tasks.title: Generate deliverable file
acceptance_criteria: result.txt is exactly one line: OK: deliverable generated

tasks.title: Create a human-readable summary

tasks.title: Implement logging module for the pipeline

tasks.title: Write usage documentation for the logging module
acceptance_criteria: outputs/logging_usage_doc.md exists with setup steps and an example showing how to use the logging module

tasks.title: 需求梳理与成功指标定义
acceptance_criteria: 内容包含夜间运行目标、数据来源、审计/合规要求、成功判定指标（至少3条）
tasks.created_from_goal: Build an auditable AI pipeline that can run tasks overnight and verify results in the morning.

tasks.title: 总体架构与数据流设计
acceptance_criteria: 包含主要组件列表、数据流顺序（含输入/输出）、审计日志写入点描述
tasks.created_from_goal: Build an auditable AI pipeline that can run tasks overnight and verify results in the morning.

tasks.title: 调度与编排方案
acceptance_criteria: 记录夜间触发时间、任务顺序/并行性、重试/超时策略、失败处理流程
tasks.created_from_goal: Build an auditable AI pipeline that can run tasks overnight and verify results in the morning.

tasks.title: 日志、监控与告警规范
acceptance_criteria: 包含日志字段规范、存储/留存策略、核心监控指标、告警规则（至少2条）
tasks.created_from_goal: Build an auditable AI pipeline that can run tasks overnight and verify results in the morning.

tasks.title: 晨检验证清单

tasks.created_from_goal: Build an auditable AI pipeline that can run tasks overnight and verify results in the morning.

tasks.title: 风险与缓解措施
